abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo postpones annual New Year's Day open house at Executive Mansion, citing anniversary of his father's death.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the event, typically held at the Executive Mansion on New Year’s Day, would be postponed until Easter Sunday because Friday is the first anniversary of his father’s death.

headline.main: Cuomo Postpones Annual Open House at Executive Mansion

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the event, typically held at the Executive Mansion on New Year’s Day, would be postponed until Easter Sunday because Friday is the first anniversary of his father’s death.
